protocol_name: Immunohistochemistry protocol for detection of fetuin-A via APAAP-Kit in older human autopsy tissue
protocol_name_html: Immunohistochemistry protocol for detection of fetuin-A via APAAP-Kit in older human autopsy tissue
description: This staining was employed to detect Fetuin-A  in paraffin sections (1 μm thickness) of formalin-fixed human brain tissue. For fetuin-A staining, we used a monoclonal IgG2a mouse-anti-human antibody (clone MAHS-1, dilution 0.1-0.5 µg/mL), raised against purified human fetuin-A in our laboratories. Antibodies were diluted in a 1% dilution of Bovine serum albumin (BSA) in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) and were immediately applied to the re-hydrated sections. Bound antibody was detected using Dako REAL™ Detection System, which employs APAAP immunochemistry and fast red chromogenic substrate (Dako K5000, Glostrup, Denmark) following the manufacturers protocol. Counterstaining was employed with Mayer´s hematoxylin solution (Roth, T160.1, one minute). The slides were then washed in demineralized water and dehydrated in graded alcohol (concentrations from 70% to 100%). After placing in xylene the sections were mounted (Roth, T160.1) and covered using coverslips.
manuscript_citation: Heinen MC, Babler A, Weis J, Elsas J, Nolte K, Kipp M, Jahnen-Dechent W, Häusler M (2018) Fetuin-A protein distribution in mature inflamed and ischemic brain tissue. PLoS ONE 13(11): e0206597. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0206597
guidelines:
- use with APAAP (Alkaline Phosphatase - Anti-Alkaline Phosphatase) Kit (Dako K5000, Glostrup, Denmark)

- positive control: human liver

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"9obvr","text":"Place slides in hybridization oven: 37\u00b0C overnight, then 1 hour at 65\u00b0C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chhvp","text":"Deparaffination in xylene 3x20 minutes (3 different containers) on a shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drrqt","text":"Rehydration in graded ethanol: 3x2 minutes in 100% ethanol, followed by 2x2 minutes in 96% ethanol and at last 2 minutes in 70% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ld7s","text":"Wash in phosphate buffered saline (PBS) for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vsj4","text":"Antigen retrieval in citrate buffer (10 mM) in a heat steamer for 30 minutes. Afterwards let the slides cool down in phosphate buffered saline for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fs99o","text":"Wash slides in PBS for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"624s7","text":"Encircle each tissue section with a wax pen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97g12","text":"Apply the primary antibody in 1% dilution of Bovine serum albumin (BSA) in PBS, 100 \u00b5l per section (negative controls: only 1% dilution), incubation overnight in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"323u2","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"26m7o","text":"Wash in PBS for 2x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ff0ml","text":"Apply the secondary antibody DAKO REAL Link (APAAP Kit, bottle A) 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 30 minutes in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bfslr","text":"Tip off excess solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c53ru","text":"Wash in PBS for 2x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30m2v","text":"Apply Dako REAL APAAP Immunocomplex (APAAP Kit, bottle B), 100 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 30 minutes in a moisture chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2tgb5","text":"Tip off solution and rinse in demineralized water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f13rc","text":"Wash in PBS for 2x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erqfc","text":"Prepare the substrate working solution (CHROME): To each 750 \u00b5l of AP Substrate Buffer (APAAP Kit , bottle F) add 30 \u00b5l chromogen Red 1 (APAAP Kit, bottle C), 30 \u00b5l chromogen Red 2 (APAAP Kit, bottle D) and 30 \u00b5l chromogen Red 3 (APAAP Kit, bottle D) in this exact order. Mix well and use within 20 minutes!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hse3","text":"Apply substrate working solution (CHROME), 200 \u00b5l per section, incubation for 20 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"du1pi","text":"Wash in demineralized water for 2x5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"120q6","text":"Submerge slides in Mayer\u00b4s hematoxylin for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"57jvh","text":"Rinse in demineralized running water for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i3mm","text":"Dehydrate in graded ethanol: 1 minute in 70% ethanol, following 1 minute in 96% ethanol and 2 minutes in 100% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"am6md","text":"Place the tissue samples in xylene for 3x1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7k12o","text":"Coverslip using mounting medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"48fo2","text":"See Guidelines","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
